none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2021-12-unreal-thought/extracted/Unreal Thought - Morose Paradise/02 The Look, The Talk
Unreal Thought - Morose Paradise / The Look, The Talk
Morose Paradise / The Look, The Talk
Unreal Thought - Morose Paradise / The Look, The Talk

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 30, 2021 Description from Terminal Escape:
 I'm going to keep talking about the music that's been coming from Canada's Atlantic Provinces, because it just keeps coming. Punks from the region were responsible for some of my favorite sounds of 2021, and still I dig into the past few years and keep finding more. UNREAL THOUGHT weren't a new discovery, and I wasn't surprised that these two songs were great (because all of the other ones were too). What if your entire discography was just four perfect cassettes and then you were like "nah, we're just gonna go make another perfect band now" and then....you did? That's what it would be like to be in UNREAL THOUGHT. MOROSE PARADISE // THE LOOK, THE TALK
https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEhzrIZrTscsCGzJndqjibR1tQXd5p6uhAwy-FcdaXZWq3XtuJhxRPs0vDWs_wTz-iIWzqYlqcswLDXnRn2a71FKCzC86zZm-lxxNuwPg_XofTmxPHEvqUW5ZKrFY1qRA9hM67vhKsd-8rdIPgD--1MVM_I-U4h8H9ZUi-XARbBtI04jvIUqevYifl7ABw=s824 https://terminalescape.blogspot.com/search?q=unreal+thought https://unrealthought.bandcamp.com/
